languages.text: "Бунтовщики слишком хорошо организованы, осведомлены и вооружены. Налицо признаки индоктринации в еретические верования — ими явно дирижирует кто-то компетентный и харизматичный. Губернатор, вы имеете дело с культом Архиврага, растущим с пугающей скоростью".

"The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."
languages.original_text: "Бунтовщики слишком хорошо организованы, осведомлены и вооружены. Налицо признаки индоктринации в еретические верования — ими явно дирижирует кто-то компетентный и харизматичный. Губернатор, вы имеете дело с культом Архиврага, растущим с пугающей скоростью".

traits.locale_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

"The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

"The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

"The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

languages.text: “那些暴乱分子组织严密、消息灵通、武装精良。而且，有迹象表明，那些人被灌输了异端信仰。很显然，某个精明强干的领袖正在指挥这些暴乱分子。你面对的敌人是混沌大敌的邪教，而且他们正在以惊人的速度不断扩张，总督。”
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: “那些暴乱分子组织严密、消息灵通、武装精良。而且，有迹象表明，那些人被灌输了异端信仰。很显然，某个精明强干的领袖正在指挥这些暴乱分子。你面对的敌人是混沌大敌的邪教，而且他们正在以惊人的速度不断扩张，总督。”

languages.text: «Los alborotadores están demasiado organizados, demasiado bien informados y demasiado bien equipados. Hay señales claras de que han sido adoctrinados con creencias heréticas, una señal clara de que les dirige alguien competente y carismático. Gobernador, se enfrenta a un culto del Archienemigo que se propaga a ritmo alarmante».
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: «Los alborotadores están demasiado organizados, demasiado bien informados y demasiado bien equipados. Hay señales claras de que han sido adoctrinados con creencias heréticas, una señal clara de que les dirige alguien competente y carismático. Gobernador, se enfrenta a un culto del Archienemigo que se propaga a ritmo alarmante».

languages.text: 「暴徒たちは組織化され、十分な情報を持ち、武装している。異端的な信念を教え込まれた形跡もある…能力があり、カリスマ性を併せ持つ何者かに指示を受けているのは間違いない。総督、お前は驚異的な速度で勢力を増している、渾沌の勢力の魔女団を相手にしているのだ」
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒たちは組織化され、十分な情報を持ち、武装している。異端的な信念を教え込まれた形跡もある…能力があり、カリスマ性を併せ持つ何者かに指示を受けているのは間違いない。総督、お前は驚異的な速度で勢力を増している、渾沌の勢力の魔女団を相手にしているのだ」

languages.text: « Les émeutiers sont trop bien organisés, trop bien informés et trop bien armés. Nous avons également décelé des signes d'endoctrinement aux croyances hérétiques. Ils ont très probablement pour meneur quelqu'un de compétent et de charismatique. Monsieur le gouverneur, vous avez affaire à un culte du Grand Ennemi qui se développe à une vitesse alarmante. »
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: « Les émeutiers sont trop bien organisés, trop bien informés et trop bien armés. Nous avons également décelé des signes d'endoctrinement aux croyances hérétiques. Ils ont très probablement pour meneur quelqu'un de compétent et de charismatique. Monsieur le gouverneur, vous avez affaire à un culte du Grand Ennemi qui se développe à une vitesse alarmante. »

languages.text: "Die Aufständischen sind zu gut organisiert, zu gut informiert, zu gut bewaffnet. Es gibt Anzeichen, dass sie von ketzerischen Überzeugungen indoktriniert wurden. Sie werden offenkundig von jemandem äußerst Kompetenten und Charismatischen angeführt. Gouverneur, Ihr habt es mit einem Kult des Erzfeinds zu tun, der mit alarmierender Geschwindigkeit wächst."
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aufständischen sind zu gut organisiert, zu gut informiert, zu gut bewaffnet. Es gibt Anzeichen, dass sie von ketzerischen Überzeugungen indoktriniert wurden. Sie werden offenkundig von jemandem äußerst Kompetenten und Charismatischen angeführt. Gouverneur, Ihr habt es mit einem Kult des Erzfeinds zu tun, der mit alarmierender Geschwindigkeit wächst."

languages.text: "İsyancılar çok iyi organize olmuş, bilgilendirilmiş ve silahlanmış durumda. Kâfirce inançların telkin edildiğine dair işaretler var. Yetkin ve karizmatik biri tarafından yönlendirildikleri aşikâr. Sayın Vali, endişe verici bir hızla büyüyen bir Şerbaşı tarikatıyla karşı karşıyasınız."
languages.original_text: "The rioters are too well organised, too well informed, too well armed. There are signs of indoctrination into heretical beliefs — they are clearly being directed by someone competent and charismatic. Governor, you are dealing with an Archenemy cult that is growing at an alarming rate."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancılar çok iyi organize olmuş, bilgilendirilmiş ve silahlanmış durumda. Kâfirce inançların telkin edildiğine dair işaretler var. Yetkin ve karizmatik biri tarafından yönlendirildikleri aşikâr. Sayın Vali, endişe verici bir hızla büyüyen bir Şerbaşı tarikatıyla karşı karşıyasınız."
